invalid_discord_access_token.message: Failed to authenticate, please login again.

remove_whitelisted_sender_success.message: Successfully removed the sender from your sender whitelist.

add_whitelisted_sender_success.message: Successfully added the sender to your sender whitelist.

edit_filtered_sender_success.message: Successfully edited the desired filtered sender.

remove_blacklisted_sender_success.message: Successfully removed the sender from your sender blacklist.

add_blacklisted_sender_success.message: Successfully added the sender to your sender blacklist.

discord_oauth_error_old.message: An error occured while trying to authenticate with discord.

csrf_token_mismatch.message: There was a problem processing your authentication request.
csrf_token_mismatch.description: Your request could not be completed due to a security issue. It appears the request did not originate from a valid source. Please try again or contact support if the issue persists.

code_grant_invalid.message: There was a problem processing your authentication request.
code_grant_invalid.description: We're sorry, but we couldn't complete your request. Please try again or contact support if you keep having trouble.

invalid_credentials.message: There was a problem processing your authentication request.
invalid_credentials.description: Oops! It seems like there was a hiccup with your request. If you made any changes to the authentication process, please revert them and try again. If you're still having trouble, our support team is here to help.

auth_error.message: There was a problem processing your authentication request.
auth_error.description: Oops! It seems like there's a problem on our end. Please try again. If the issue persists, don't hesitate to contact our support team. We're here to help!

missing_scopes_gmail.message: There was a problem processing your authentication request.
missing_scopes_gmail.description: Oops! It looks like the necessary permissions weren't granted. Please make sure to check the box for 'View your email messages and settings' on the Google authentication page and try again. If you're still having trouble, our support team is here to help!
